about_the_game:
Life in your cushy penthouse is about to take a twisted turn, my dear. I'll be hunting you down, stalking every move you make, and I've got only one thing on my mind… domination.

Lily's Labyrinth of Lust is a pulse-pounding game of cat and mouse. If you can outsmart me, maybe you'll be in control, but if I catch you? Well... let's say you'll find out exactly how much you can take.

Can you handle my relentless gaze, find ways to keep me distracted, resist my taunts, and try to keep up? Or will you surrender and let me take you on a wild ride you'll never forget?

— Lily

Lily is your girlfriend, but don't let her love fool you—she's a nymphomaniac driven by an overwhelming need for control. Relentlessly chasing you down, she'll stop at nothing to pin you into submission.

At first, Lily might seem playful and teasing, but don't be deceived. As the game progresses, Lily will become more relentless, aggressive, and aware of your every move.

Her playful taunts echo in your ear, daring you to escape, yet she closes the distance with fiery determination with every attempt. There's no escaping her insatiable hunger once she's set her sights on you.

Lily isn't just chasing you; she's toying with your emotions too. Be ready for unexpected shifts in her behavior, and don't fall for her sweet words—no matter how convincing she may seem.

As she hunts you down, you'll need to use every item that you can find—like butt plugs or your trusty taser gun—that might momentarily suppress her insatiable desire, but don't be fooled; it only holds her back for a while.

While trying to escape from Lily, you'll need to locate and activate three separate Butt Plugs scattered throughout your luxury apartment. These can only be used when Lily is unsuspecting and from behind, requiring you to be strategic and creative.

Also, Lily guards the butt plug remote, which is secured with multiple keycards. To gain access, you'll need to unlock each one through door scanners before you can finally bring Lily under your control.

Can you outwit her and regain control, showing her who's in charge, or will you succumb to her dominance? Lily's teasing and taunts will keep you on edge, daring you to run, but she's always just behind you, getting closer with every move.

With more game completions, you'll unlock more delicious outfits to satiate your cravings. Latex, leather, stockings – you'll have it all to choose from: one sexy look after the next.

But Lily's Labyrinth of Lust doesn't stop there, and this game is fine-tuned for you. Change aspects of Lily's appearance for a maximized, intimately personal experience.

Want to breed her on the bed in a bunny suit, bend her over the plush office desk in her lacy lingerie, or take her in the kitchen while she acts like your sexy maid?

The choice is yours...but only if you outsmart her.

Powered by Unreal Engine, Lily's Labyrinth of Lust offers mouth-watering, eye-catching physics that brings the world (and Lily's body) to life. From every sultry movement to dynamic interactions, the engine ensures a truly immersive experience.

Watch as the details in Lily's appearance, from her curves to her clothing, react fluidly to her actions, heightening the sensuality and intensity of the chase.

Every environment is meticulously crafted to provide a visually stimulating and engaging gameplay experience.

Wishlist now, my darling, and I promise I will be gentle with you!

- Lily

content_descriptors.notes:
Lily’s Labyrinth of Lust may not be appropriate for all age cohorts, due to the inclusion of nudity and sex scenes. 

Sex scenes include:
Normal Sex
Sexual Assualt / non-consensual sex on loss

General Mature Content

name: Lily’s Labyrinth of Lust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 8.1, 10, 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X (3.5 GHz 4 Core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3050 (req. 6GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (req. 6GB VRAM) / Intel ARC A650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 8.1, 10, 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X (3.7 GHz 8 Core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 (req. 8GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT (req. 8GB VRAM) / Intel ARC A770
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Lily’s Labyrinth of Lust is a 3D Hentai game of cat and mouse indulging in hypersexual, adrenaline-pumping chases while battling for your survival. Find and use tools to subdue Lily or be ready to be dominated by her infinite sex appetite. Will victory taste as sweet as her?
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
